German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From reisend (“traveling”), present participle of the verb reisen (“to travel”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈraɪ̯zn̩dɐ/

Noun[edit]

Reisender m (genitive Reisenden, plural Reisende, female Reisende)

  1. tourist
  2. traveller, voyager

Derived terms[edit]

Related terms[edit]

  • Reisende

Noun[edit]

Reisender f

  1. genitive singular of Reisende
